## `SetUserAgent`

Sets the user agent\index{web harvester!user agent} used when reading or downloading content from websites.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
SetUserAgent(string userAgent)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
| `string` userAgent | The user agent to send to servers when connecting to websites. |
:::
